Title: Enacts "The Domestic Violence Protection Act - Brittany's Law" requiring registration of violent felony offenders
Summary: Enacts "The Domestic Violence Protection Act - Brittany's Law" requiring registration of violent felony offenders; sets forth duties of the division of criminal justice services; establishes a special telephone number; requires the division to maintain a subdirectory of violent predators.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the correction law, in relation to enacting "The Domestic Violence Protection Act - Brittany's Law"
